Free Online Video Editor

AI-powered online video editor with text-based editing. Create professional videos in minutes. Start for free

Get startedTry AI Text-to-Video

4.6

319 reviews

Complete video editor online with AI automation

Edit videos faster with VEED’s all-in-one video editor. Trim, crop, and add text with drag-and-drop simplicity. Use text-based editing to cut clips by editing the transcript, or let Auto Edits add subtitles, clean audio, and insert B-roll. Unlike other editors that specialize in one thing, VEED offers the complete workflow: create, edit, and enhance videos in a few clicks.

Repurpose long videos into platform-ready shorts for TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube. Starting from scratch? Generate complete videos from text prompts using our AI video generator. Plus, collaborate with your team in real-time and access your projects from any browser—no software download required. Start editing for free and create professional content in minutes.

How to edit videos with the free video editor:

Step 1

Get started

Upload your video and quickly trim, crop, and rotate it. Resize videos in one click for social media.

Step 2

Pro features

Instantly translate videos, add subtitles in multiple languages, remove your video’s background, and clean your audio.

Step 3

Export and share

Export your video in the best quality and share it on your social media pages, YouTube channel, and website.

Learn More

Learn how to edit by text in this AI video editor walkthrough:

FOCUS ON WORK

One-click editing with AI

  • Create videos on the web video editor with the help of our AI video generator tools, powered by leading AI video models like VEO 3, PixVerse AI, Kling AI and MiniMax AI. Use our text-to-video app to generate content from text prompts. Just type a description, and our AI will produce a professional-quality, editable video.
  • Minimize re-takes and let our AI eye contact tool instantly redirect your eyes to the camera. Always look professional on screen.
  • Clone your voice to add instant voiceovers to your videos using your voice profile. No need to record each time!
  • Use our AI avatars to make talking head videos for marketing and business communications.

Online video maker for social media and business

  • Create professional-looking videos for social marketing, training, and education. Start with our highly customizable video templates!
  • Instantly remove background noise from your video to ensure your content is free from audible distractions. Create crystal-clear audio for your audience.
  • No need for green screens! Now, you can automatically remove your video’s background. Replace it with a solid color, an image, or even another video.
  • Perfectly polish your videos by removing unwanted silences, awkward pauses, or filler words (like “er” or “um”) in just a few seconds.
  • Plus, our online movie making software is a complete video editing suite that lets you collaborate on projects with fellow creatives.

Translate subtitles, audio, and more

  • Automatically add subtitles to your videos with near-perfect accuracy. Add animations, highlight words, and select from various subtitle styles.
  • Transcribe your audio and translate it into over 100 languages in just one click! Reach a global audience with minimal costs.
  • Our text-to-speech tool lets you add voiceovers and narrations without manually recording your voice. Select from different voice profiles and accents, and create videos that speak to your audience in their own language.

A complete video editing software for content creators

  • VEED is a powerful online video maker that lets you collaborate on video projects with fellow video content creators.
  • Edit audio files, compress videos to make them easily shareable, and edit subtitles in a breeze.
  • Generate instant transcripts, translate video and audio, and so much more. Grow your online presence by creating engaging content—all in a few clicks.
  • Use our full suite of AI video editing tools to create AI videos quickly. Apply visual effects and special effects, and edit videos with the help of AI.
Get started

FAQ

VEED combines text-based editing, automatic edits, and AI video generation in one online video editor. Edit a video by editing the transcript, and cut clips as easily as deleting text. Upload footage and let Auto Edits add subtitles, clean audio, and insert B-roll. Or generate complete videos from text prompts using AI.

Unlike other editors that specialize in one thing, VEED offers the complete workflow: create, edit, enhance, and export. No need to juggle multiple platforms or navigate complex software like Adobe Premiere.

VEED is the best free online video editor for businesses and creators. Unlike desktop software requiring downloads and steep learning curves, VEED is an intuitive, browser-based editor. While Adobe Express requires navigating complex interfaces and DaVinci Resolve needs technical expertise, VEED offers professional features with intuitive drag-and-drop editing. Start creating immediately—perfect for marketing teams, podcasters, and educators.

Yes, for specific features. Free users get basic editing tools, such as trim, crop, resize, and add text and music. They can also export videos in 720p, perfect for social media sharing. A free plan also offers one-time trials to AI video editing tools like Auto Edits, AI B-roll, and audio cleanup. Free exports include a watermark. Upgrade to a premium plan for 4K exports, unlimited AI features, and watermark-free videos.

Whether you’re editing a few clips for YouTube or looking for a more advanced movie editor to create professional videos, VEED offers advanced tools that are super easy to use. No download required. You can start editing in a few clicks. For super quick video editing, check out our online video editor - for free.

Yes. You will find a library of stock video and royalty-free audio that you can edit, publish and incorporate into your content. Anyone can create amazing videos with our online movie making software, and you don’t even need a camera.

Our online video editor works in all browsers, including Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge, and Firefox. VEED also works on any device - Mac, iPhone, iPad, Windows, Android, and Linux. Always update your browser to ensure the best experience.

Do Not Sell My Personal Information

© Copyright 2026 VEED

But First, Cookies 🍪

We use essential cookies to make VEED work. We’d like to use other cookies to improve and personalise your visit, tailor ads you see from us on VEED and partner sites, and to analyse our website’s performance, but only if you accept. Learn more about your choices in ourcookie policy
Your Opt Out Preference Signal is Honored

Do Not Sell My Personal Information

When you visit our website, we store cookies on your browser to collect information. The information collected might relate to you, your preferences or your device, and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to and to provide a more personalized web experience. However, you can choose not to allow certain types of cookies, which may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings according to your preference. You cannot opt-out of our First Party Strictly Necessary Cookies as they are deployed in order to ensure the proper functioning of our website (such as prompting the cookie banner and remembering your settings, to log into your account, to redirect you when you log out, etc.). For more information about the First and Third Party Cookies used please follow this link.
Read our full Cookie Policy

Manage Consent Preferences

Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

Sale of Personal Data

Under the California Consumer Privacy Act, you have the right to opt-out of the sale of your personal information to third parties. These cookies collect information for analytics and to personalize your experience with targeted ads. You may exercise your right to opt out of the sale of personal information by using this toggle switch. If you opt out we will not be able to offer you personalised ads and will not hand over your personal information to any third parties. Additionally, you may contact our legal department for further clarification about your rights as a California consumer by using this Exercise My Rights link.

If you have enabled privacy controls on your browser (such as a plugin), we have to take that as a valid request to opt-out. Therefore we would not be able to track your activity through the web. This may affect our ability to personalize ads according to your preferences.

  • Targeting Cookies
    label

    These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

  • Performance Cookies
    label

    These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

  • Social Media Cookies
    label

    These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.
